title: Proficiency
content: Half-Elf Lvl 1 Greatsword Proficiency Feature Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with Greatswords. Githyanki Battleaxe Proficiency Feature Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with Battleaxes. Dwarf Handaxe Proficiency Feature Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with Handaxes. Dwarf Light Hammer Proficiency Feature Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target)
